snippet: An Egyptian criminal court acquitted the former chief of a Mubarak-era security service of charges that they destroyed documents that could have implicated members of their feared apparatus in crimes.
abstract: Egyptian criminal court acquits former chief of Mubarak-era security service and 40 other officers of charges that they destroyed documents that could have implicated members of their feared apparatus in crimes.
lead_paragraph: An Egyptian criminal court acquitted the former chief of a Mubarak-era security service of charges that they destroyed documents that could have implicated members of their feared apparatus in crimes.
